content:
Summarize this event. In particular, tell me:
        - Event organizer (no contact info)
        - Time and date
        - Room booked
        - Number of attendees
        - Event type
        - Catering or drink packages and choices. If they choose catering or drink packages, be careful and detailed with their choices.
        - Special requests in the notes
        - When the organizer last emailed
        - Payment information (but no etransfer information).

          Respond in bullet points or short sentences.
          Be detalied about special requests by organizers. 

        Event details: {"name":"Marlene Saunders","email":"marlene@marlenesaunders.com","phone":"14162095648","startTime":"2024-11-21T19:00","endTime":"2024-11-21T22:00","room":"Lounge","attendance":"100","partyType":"jobseeker networking event","services":"bar;lights;audio;music;kareoke","notes":"[11/19/2024 17:50] Update from email:\n- Setup chairs pointing towards the stage for approximately 60+ attendees (possible increase in attendance).\n- Organizer plans to arrive at 6:30 PM for setup.\n- Acknowledgment of hard stop at 10:00 PM, with potential extension of up to 30 minutes.\n\n$150 deposit to book"}
        Recent email conversation: Yes, towards the stage please. We will be mindful of the time as wellThanks, Marlene416 209-5648
On Nov 19, 2024, at 1:30 PM, Taco Taco <info@eattaco.ca> wrote:
We'll let our staff know to set up chairs. Is it fair to assume it'd be set to be pointing towards the stage? 
Hard stop is technically 10:00pm, but you can extend up to a max of 30 mins. We just want to be fair to our staff who are scheduled til 11:00pm
TacoTaco Events Team(647) 692-4768 | info@eattaco.ca eattaco.ca
On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 11:46 AM Marlene Saunders 2017 <marlene@marlenesaunders.com> wrote:
Hi there, I have a couple of questions about the event on Thursday. Can we have chairs set up? So far we have about 60 people coming. There might be more. We plan on coming at 6:30 to set up. Do we have a hard stop at 10?
Thanks, 
Marlene
416 209-5648

- **Event Organizer:** Marlene Saunders
- **Time and Date:** November 21, 2024, from 7:00 PM to 10:00 PM (with a possible extension to 10:30 PM)
- **Room Booked:** Lounge
- **Number of Attendees:** 100 (possible increase)
- **Event Type:** Jobseeker networking event
- **Catering or Drink Packages and Choices:** No specific catering or drink packages mentioned in the details provided.
- **Special Requests in the Notes:**
  - Setup of chairs pointing towards the stage for approximately 60+ attendees.
  - Organizer plans to arrive at 6:30 PM for setup.
  - Acknowledgment of hard stop at 10:00 PM, with the possibility of a 30-minute extension.
- **When the Organizer Last Emailed:** November 19, 2024, at 5:50 PM
- **Payment Information:** A $150 deposit has been made to book the event.
